divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to take down christmas lights and saw all of my neighbors outside looking up, i asked my husband whats going on and he said that they saw a ufo and its still there. I went in my back yard and looked at it, at first because of the blinking lights you would think it was a plane, but it didnt move it stayed in the same place. So i went back to the front where ppl had binoculars and i asked to see with them. I saw and very noticably it was changing colors from red, blue and green and white. it was there for at least an hour, thats when i stopped watching. Several ppl saw the same thing.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Colton
There were no other sightings in Colton on or around January 4th 2010
